R2.description: Do not change 'R2' binding name. Bucket name is customizable.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Back up R2 logs to GitHub for analysis with your AI assistant. Create a [Personal Access Token](https://github.com/settings/tokens) with 'repo' scope (all 5 checkboxes) and 'No expiration' like this: [Sample Image](https://fullscore.org/wp-content/uploads/Github-example-01-Serverless-analytics-with-direct-AI-analysis-Full-Score.png)
